root: ^Hello Adventurer! Do you have some time to help me?

help: ^Sure, what do you need help with?
help1: ^There are so many monsters roaming that are destroying my crops.
^That's terrible. I can help get rid of them for you!
^I can help you in exchange for some gold.
help3: ^Sorry, I dont have much money. I can give you a portion of my harvests instead.
^Sorry, I am busy with other requests that have better pay.
noHelp: ^I see... Please come back when you are free.
